channel.title: web-tool on Danny's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in web-tool on Danny's Blog

item.title: Use Hugo to Setup Personal Blog
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is the first post. This blog is constructed using Hugo. Praise the creators of it! In this blog I am going to introduce the procedure of building this blog. Introduction Hugo is a framework written in Go to generate static blog site from various formats of content. It has various shining points: It can be easily configured in a TOML configuration file.
